title: Security Is Everybodys Business
brief_description: Substance abuse, theft of drugs for re-sale, accidental injury, mugging, kidnapping and theft of records are some of the security and safety problems that occur in hospitals. This video, aimed particularly at health care workers, outlines precautions that may be taken to prevent these occurrences.
